recipesJson.name: Celebrate: Berry Mimosa
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
This was mixed Live on Wed 10/16/2019.  This has turned out absolutely delicious.  
A Berry Mimosa, only 4 ingredients.  Enjoy.  
https://youtu.be/XLvI-TzIN68
Tested and vaping on a Hadeon RDA .24 ohm 50 watts.

reviews.text: I get a satisfying, full-flavored vape that mostly tastes as it should. Champagne with a splash of orange and berries. The champagne is perfect, has a fizzy feel, and isn’t too funky. There’s very nice syrupy sweet mostly-raspberry-tasting berry depth, with some darker black & blueberry hints in the base. I think the catch here is how you perceive FLV Berry Blend. I find it to be a touch floral and I’m getting that here as well, even at just 1.4%. It just has a light floral edge, to the extent that this Berry Mimosa tastes like it has flowers on top of it. If we’re being real, it tastes like someone was trying too hard to get something in the FLV recipe book when they could have chosen different mixed berry and avoided that bit of floral upfront.
